sect1.title: Creating a file system on the new partition
sect1.para: Once the partition is created, we have to create a new file system on that partition. If you want to create an ext2 file system, use the mke2fs command. If you want to create a reiser file system, use the mkreiserfs command. If you want to create a different kind of file system, use the appropriate command.
